snippet: After the Corcoran Gallery of Art in Washington alarmed fans of its spectacular Beaux-Arts home near the White House by announcing this summer that it was considering a relocation, the board of trustees said on Monday that its members have decided...
abstract: After the Corcoran Gallery of Art in Washington alarmed fans of its spectacular Beaux-Arts home near the White House by announcing this summer that it was considering a relocation, the board of trustees said on Monday that its members have decided against a move.

headline.main: Corcoran Gallery of Art Will Stay Put
